objects.name: Light Orb
objects.descrip: A spherical structure that emits diffused white light when activated.

objects.name: Charging Block
objects.descrip: A device that charges your Chip. Attatched to it is a long cord. Don't forget to plug in before you go to bed!

objects.name: Body Cleanser
objects.descrip: A device that cleanses your body.

objects.name: Eliminator
objects.descrip: A place to eliminate bodily waste.

objects.name: Spout
objects.descrip: A place to cleanse your hands and get water.
